attributes.action: MPs seeking to overturn/hinder Brexit to be expelled from Parliament.
attributes.background: The country voted to leave the undemocratic & bullying EU on June 23rd 2016. Democracy has spoken and any MPs that seek to subvert that democracy by thwarting - or seeking to overturn that decision are undeserving of a place in a modern democracy.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs because of their views or opinions.
